nodesToRead.speaker: Meerkat Mac
lines: Oh, hey there bud. Haven't seen you around here before. Welcome to--
Welcome to The Boozy Burrow, the name's Mac and I'll be pourin' yer drinks while yer here...<size=35>so you fuckin' better pay up...</size>.
Yer first drink though, that's on me cheif, don't even worry 'bout it!
Just tell yer friends that Mac ain't whack! I love all customers, new and old.
Now drink up and go make some mistakes...and if ya could spare a dime or two to help me spruce this place up, I'd fuckin' appreciate it.
<size=35>I have no clue what you kids are into these days...</size>
